pages.text: Page 1$(br2)While pondering what to do today, I recalled a myth being mentioned in a nearby village. They spoke of a magical stone... something about a forbidden energy, and a large conflict. I thought they were being crazy, but it wouldn't hurt to look... right?
Page 2$(br2)I discovered a material blue crystal below the depths. It seems to hardness an incredible energy that comes and goes from everything around me...$(br2)I already have a few ideas.
